 Watch Jessica Vosk and Kelli Barrett Sing a Song From the Upcoming Broadway Musical Beaches 
 
 
 Broadway performances start on March 27 at the Majestic Theatre.
dtliExcerpt: Brian Bedford's production of Oscar Wilde's masterpiece is a delightful revival that captures both the wit and the heart of this classic comedy of manners.
